Colors

Sep 1, 2016

$r_brand-primary
HEX: #0C2340
RGB: 12 35 64
Used for: logo, backgrounds

RGB: 0 169 224
Used for: primary CTAs

RGB: 0 178 169
Used for: secondary CTAs
